analysis.description:
Reentrancy in InsightsNetwork2.importBalanceOf (/unique_chucks/19/0x7585359453bf5d2f7c2fe74e4db4530403ab0c10.sol#608-620):
	External calls:
	- amount = InsightsNetwork1(predecessor).balances(account) * ATTOTOKEN_FACTOR (/unique_chucks/19/0x7585359453bf5d2f7c2fe74e4db4530403ab0c10.sol#611-613)
	- unlockTime = InsightsNetwork1(predecessor).unlockTimes(account) (/unique_chucks/19/0x7585359453bf5d2f7c2fe74e4db4530403ab0c10.sol#613-614)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- imported (/unique_chucks/19/0x7585359453bf5d2f7c2fe74e4db4530403ab0c10.sol#614)
amount in InsightsNetwork2Base.lockedBalanceOf (/unique_chucks/19/0x7585359453bf5d2f7c2fe74e4db4530403ab0c10.sol#553-554) is a local variable never initialiazed

	- lockedBalances (/unique_chucks/19/0x7585359453bf5d2f7c2fe74e4db4530403ab0c10.sol#615-620)
